hero.title: Find work near you.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Achieve your dream job in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Join the platform as a job seeker or employer. Create your profile and set your preferences.

step2.title: Explore Listings
step2.description: Find job listings that suit you based on location, category, and salary filters. View them on the map.

step3.title: Apply and Connect
step3.description: Submit your application with one click. Message employers, ask questions, and schedule interviews.

step4.title: Start Working
step4.description: Application approved? Congratulations! Learn the details of starting work after receiving employer approval.

about.title: Making the job world
about.description: Mesai is a platform that removes barriers between job seekers and employers, enabling everyone to work flexibly and securely.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To build a secure, fast, and transparent bridge between job seekers and employers. To democratize the job world through technology, enabling everyone to work on their own terms.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become Turkey's most trusted and user-friendly job finding platform. To touch the lives of millions and create a new standard in the job world.

faq.title: Let us
faq.description: Everything you want to know about Mesai

q1.question: What is Mesai and how does it work?
q1.answer: Mesai is a platform that connects job seekers and employers based on location. Users can discover, apply for, and work flexibly at nearby job opportunities. Employers can quickly post job listings and match with suitable candidates.

q2.question: How can I register for Mesai?
q2.answer: You can quickly register by downloading our mobile app or through our website using your phone number. After completing identity verification, you can immediately start searching for jobs or posting listings.

q3.question: Is there a fee for job seekers?
q3.answer: No! Mesai is completely free for job seekers. All features including job finding, applying, and earnings tracking are provided free of charge.

q4.question: What is the pricing for employers?
q4.answer: We offer two different plans for employers: Standard (₺499/month) and Premium (₺999/month). The Standard plan includes 10 active job listings, while the Premium plan offers unlimited listings and advanced features.

q5.question: How are payments made?
q5.answer: All payments are made securely through the platform. After the job is completed, payment is automatically transferred to the worker's account. Employers can pay by credit card, debit card, or wire transfer.

q6.question: What are your security measures?
q6.answer: All our users go through identity verification. Employers are verified and payments are made through secure payment systems. We also create a trustworthy community through our rating system.

q7.question: Which cities do you serve?
q7.answer: We currently actively serve in Istanbul, Ankara, Izmir, Bursa, and Antalya. We plan to expand throughout Turkey soon.

q8.question: I couldn't find a job, what should I do?
q8.answer: Complete your profile, specify your skills, and keep your notifications on. You can also access more job opportunities by expanding your location settings. Our support team is always ready to help you.

q9.question: How can I post a listing as an employer?
q9.answer: After creating an employer account, click the 'Post Job' button to enter job details, location, salary information, and required skills. Your listing will start showing to suitable candidates after approval.

q10.question: How can I reach your support team?
q10.answer: You can send us an email through our contact page, call us by phone, or get instant help from our live support line. We actively serve weekdays between 09:00-18:00.

cta.title: Didn't find your answer?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help you. Contact us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: As Mesai Technologies ("Mesai", "we", "our"), we consider protecting our users' privacy as one of our top priorities. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.intro: To provide our services, we collect the following information:
section2.item1: Identity information (name, surname, phone number, email address)

section3.title: 3. Use of Information
section3.intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
section3.item1: To provide and improve platform services
section3.item2: To match job seekers with employers

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.intro: We share your personal information with third parties only in the following cases:
section4.item1: Necessary information between employers and job seekers for job matching
section4.item2: With secure payment providers for payment processing
section4.item3: With authorized authorities due to legal requirements

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data. Your data is stored encrypted and protected against unauthorized access.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.intro: Under KVKK, you have the following rights:
section6.item1: To learn whether your personal data is being processed
section6.item2: To request information if it has been processed
section6.item3: To request correction or deletion of data
section6.item4: To learn the third parties to whom data has been transferred
section6.item5: To object to a result against you arising from the analysis of processed data exclusively through automated systems

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.content: Our platform uses cookies to improve user experience. For detailed information about cookie usage, please review our Cookie Policy.

section8.title: 8. Changes
section8.content: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. We will inform you when significant changes occur.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.intro: For questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us:
section9.address: Fulya, Yeşilçimen Sokağı Polat Tower Residence Bağımsız Bölüm 12/430 34349 Beşiktaş/İstanbul

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By using the Mesai platform, you are deemed to have accepted these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our platform.

section2.title: 2. Account Creation
section2.content: When registering for Mesai, you agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information. You are responsible for account security and all activities that occur on your account.

section3.title: 3. User Responsibilities
section3.item2: The information you provide is accurate and current
section3.item3: You will use the platform in compliance with laws
section3.item4: You will treat other users respectfully
section3.item5: You will not create fake profiles

section4.title: 4. Terms for Job Seekers
section4.item1: You must arrive on time and prepared for jobs you apply to
section4.item4: You must comply with employment contract terms

section5.title: 5. Terms for Employers
section5.item1: You must provide accurate and complete information in job listings
section5.item2: You must provide a safe working environment for employees
section5.item3: You must make payments on time
section5.item4: You must comply with labor laws and regulations

section6.title: 6. Payments and Refunds
section6.content: All payments are made securely through the platform. Employers agree to make payment after the job is completed. Job seekers agree that payment will be transferred to their account after the job is completed.

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.content: All content, design, logos, and trademarks on the Mesai platform belong to Mesai Technologies. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer
section8.content: Mesai acts as an intermediary in transactions between users. Mesai is not responsible for disputes between job seekers and employers. The platform is provided "as is" and no warranty is given.

section9.title: 9. Account Suspension and Termination
section9.content: Mesai reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts of users who violate these terms.

section10.title: 10. Changes
section10.content: These Terms of Service may be updated from time to time. Users will be informed when significant changes occur.

section11.title: 11. Contact
section11.intro: For questions about the terms of service:
section11.address: Fulya, Yeşilçimen Sokağı Polat Tower Residence Bağımsız Bölüm 12/430 34349 Beşiktaş/İstanbul

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files saved to your device (computer, tablet, or mobile device) when you visit websites. Cookies enable websites to work more efficiently and improve user experience.

section2.title: 2. Types of Cookies
section2.intro: Types of cookies we use on the Mesai platform:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the platform's basic functions. The platform does not work properly without these cookies.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: Help us understand how visitors use the site. This information is collected anonymously and used to improve site performance.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.description: Allow us to remember your preferences and provide you with a more personalized experience (e.g., language preference, theme selection).

targeting.title: Targeting/Advertising Cookies
targeting.description: Used to show you ads more relevant to you and your interests. Can also be used to limit how many times an ad is shown.

section4.title: 4. How Can You Control Cookies?
section4.intro: Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can refuse or delete cookies from your browser settings. However, if you disable cookies, some features of the platform may not work properly.
section4.chrome: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
section4.firefox: Firefox: Settings → Privacy and Security → Cookies and Site Data
section4.safari: Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Cookies and website data
section4.edge: Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
section5.content: We use third-party services such as Google Analytics on our platform. These services may use their own cookies. For more information about these cookies, please review the privacy policies of the relevant third parties.

section6.title: 6. Cookie Policy Updates
section6.content: This Cookie Policy may be updated from time to time. We will inform you when significant changes occur.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.intro: For questions about our cookie policy:
section7.address: Fulya, Yeşilçimen Sokağı Polat Tower Residence Bağımsız Bölüm 12/430 34349 Beşiktaş/İstanbul
